mapper.select: select * from member_info where mem_id = #{mem_id} and mem_pw = MD5(#{mem_pw})
mapper.insert: insert into member_info(mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_email, joined_at) values(#{mem_id}, MD5(#{mem_pw}),#{mem_name}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_email}, current_timestamp)
mapper.update: update member_info set mem_name = #{mem_name}, mem_phone = #{mem_phone}, mem_email = #{mem_email} where mem_id = #{mem_id}
